title: I forget my Wi-Fi key and Web login password I can’t login my E5373s-155
answer:
A: If you forget your Web login password, you needn’t to worry. Try to restore your E5373s-155 as following step

Press and hold the RESET button until OLED screen is off then E5373s-155 will restart, after E5373s-155 has boot up all the password will be restored to default.

Notice: After restored E5373s-155 all the user settings will be restored to default settings.

If you only forget your WiFi Key, try to set the new WiFi key in the “WLAN Basic Setting” page, input new WIFI key directly in WPA Pre Shared Key bar or select show password option the view the password.

 

In addition, view the current SSID and wireless network encryption key on the screen.
